DOC.detailed_description: 100 patient age 21-40 year old , diagnosed primary secondary infertility due follow cause infertility ; ( Pelvic Inflammatory disease , dysovulation , tubal infertility , unexplained infertility , combine infertility due male factor ) . These patient assign receive fertility treatment ( ICSI ) They undergo 3D vaginal ultrasound treatment measure junctional zone thickness follow treatment determine rate implantation . DOC.criteria: A normal transvaginal ultrasound define visible intracavitary pathology ( e.g . submucous myoma , polyp septa ) perform follicular phase menstrual cycle . Intramural myoma without impression deformation uterine cavity incorporate definition normal ultrasound Exclusion criterion include Females age 40 year old , patient endometriosis , abnormal endocrine function Diabetes mellitus , thyroid disorder adrenal abnormality , general disease , ovarian cyst azospermic partner
